document_data.caption: A map showing the Iceborn River in northern Rashemen.
document_data.name: Iceborn River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Iceborn River''' was river system found in the [[North Country]] of [[Rashemen]].
document_data.Geography: The Iceborn River was formed from several smaller unnamed tributaries that flowed south from the [[Icerim Mountains]] along the border of Rashemen and [[Narfell]]. The Iceborn flowed through the far northwestern region of the [[Endless Wastes]], crossing the [[Long Road (Northeast Faer√ªn)|Long Road]] before emptying into the northern reach of [[Lake Ashane]].
